Title: Regulates public data maintained by county and city boards of elections and establishes the New York voting and elections database and institute to maintain a statewide database of voting and election data
Summary: Regulates public data maintained by county and city boards of elections; establishes the New York voting and elections database and institute to maintain a statewide database of voting and election data.
LawCode: Add §3-112, El L; add Title 7 Art 117 §§5801 - 5805, §§2614 & 2038, amd §2553, ren §2038 to be §2039, Ed L; add R4550, CPLR; add §97-k, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, the education law, the civil practice law and rules, and the state finance law, in relation to regulating public data maintained by county and city boards of elections and establishing the New York voting and elections database and institute to maintain a statewide database of voting and election data
